description: Creates or updates a database data masking rule.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

location.description: The location of the data masking rule.

kind.description: The kind of Data Masking Rule. Metadata, used for Azure portal.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

data_masking_policy_name.description: The name of the database for which the data masking rule applies.

data_masking_rule_name.description: The name of the data masking rule.

parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a data masking rule.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
